title: Power supply unit died. Moved houses.
body:
I've just moved houses, finally got internet sorted (Using library computer for this)
And as I moved houses my power supply unit died, RIP.

I bought a new one, and I managed to get a widescreen monitor for free (Which is awesome)

To the guys who I help improve sorry I've been away, been a roller coaster of stupidity for me.
So in about 1-2 weeks should be back up, and ready to spectate games.

You guys can still do it!
I BELEIVE.

replies.body:
4:3 resolution was starting to trigger me XD 
Good to see you're finally upgrading!

I know right XD
I didn't want to do anymore until I upgraded.
nice? Shouldn't you be telling the people you help through pm and not in boards?
